name: stopwatch
description: A stopwatch component with start, pause, and stop controls. Emits elapsed time for use with Budibase bindings and automations.

outputs.name: startTime
outputs.description: ISO timestamp when the stopwatch is started

outputs.name: elapsedSeconds
outputs.description: Total elapsed seconds when the stopwatch stops

settings.label: Auto start
settings.description: Automatically start the stopwatch when the component loads

settings.label: Emit start time
settings.description: Emit the start timestamp when the stopwatch starts

settings.label: Emit minutes on pause
settings.description: Emit elapsed minutes whenever the stopwatch is paused

settings.label: Display format
settings.description: How the stopwatch time is displayed

settings.label: Tick interval (seconds)
settings.description: How often the stopwatch updates its time
